title: Is it me or does Android 11 don't work properly in the Pixel 3? I don't have bubbles.
content:
Reboot and update. 
That's funny, I still can't choose android 11 as my OS although it's already out there.

Curious ;)

Another problem I have is that I can't find a screen shot function, one that I could easy access on the power button in android 10.

Weird, right?

Would love if you could help out!

Thanks üëç
